meanings.definition: A container used to keep liquids hot or cold for an extended period of time.
meanings.sent1: I packed two thermoses with hot soup for our picnic.
meanings.sent2: The thermoses kept our drinks cold during the entire hike.
meanings.sent3: Carrying the thermoses felt like being a superhero with secret powers.
meanings.sent4: The thermoses were like magical guardians, preserving the temperature of our beverages.
meanings.sent5: The shiny thermoses gleamed in the sunlight, promising refreshing sips.
